animeTitle: Sinbad: Mahou no Lamp to Ugoku Shima
animeDescription: Sinbad and his friends run afoul of a storm while riding on the ship Bahal. Ali sights an island, which the ship heads toward to make repairs. Sinbad and Sana board a dinghy and land on the island. Sana sees a vision of a magical lamp, and Sinbad and the others set out to find it.  (Source: ANN)
animeRelated: ['Sinbad: Soratobu Hime to Himitsu no Shima', 'Sinbad: Mahiru no Yoru to Fushigi no Mon']
animeVoices: ['Tanabe, Momoko', 'Muranaka, Tomo', 'Aoyama, Yutaka', 'Ishida, Akira', 'Miyazawa, Tadashi', 'Kaga, Takeshi', 'Nagasawa, Nao']
